name: Deep-sparse-autoencoder
body:
---------------------------------------------------------

(Deep) Sparse Denoising Autoencoder

Programming by HaiLong LIU

Email: liu@em.ci.ritsumei.ac.jp

Update: 2015.12.10

https://sites.google.com/site/lhl881210/

---------------------------------------------------------
I waive copyright for this program and open the source code. But this source is prohibited for commercial purposes.

I hope this source code can support your research, and welcome to modify the code to find a bug and enhance the computing speed.

If this code is used for your research, please make a footnote to the clone address of source code in your paper.

Thanks.

Hailong LIU 2015.12.10

Code migrating for Linux by Ryo Nakashima.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
